main.description: Gazetteer makes geographical data about Hong Kong's diverse neighborhoods accessible and easy to use.
main.details:
We're collecting and standardizing numerous datasets, such as Hong Kong Census data, and making them available to everyone 
 -- journalists, researchers, developers, and anyone curious about the city around us.

profiles.instruction: Choose an area above to get started.  Zoom in for more granular areas.
profiles.title: Profile for __selectionName__

mapper.title: Map the Census Data
mapper.instruction: To begin, select a feature to overlay on the map

options.percent_population_indo_filipino: % of population that is Indonesian or Filipino
options.population_divorced_separated: % of population that is divorced or separated
options.percent_households_public_rental: % of households in public rental housing
options.percent_households_own: % of households that own their home
options.percent_population_edu_post_sec: % of population with a post-secondary education
options.percent_population_edu_students_travel: % of students that travel to another district for school
options.percent_household_lower_income: % of households making less than HK$25,000 per month (HK median is $23,000)
options.percent_workers_travel: % of workers that travel to another district for work
options.residence_stability: Residence stability (% of population that lived in the same area 5 years ago)
